name: Zookoban (jibbs, MogWow, KerDelos, zeantwan)
description:
Sokoban puzzle-game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

Push the funny-shaped animals back in their holes :)

Controls:
Move: Arrow keys
Restart level: R


Made with Godot (https://godotengine.org) by:
https://zeantwan.itch.io/ (programming)
https://kerdelos.itch.io/ (music and programming)
https://mogwow.itch.io/ (graphic design)
https://jibbs.itch.io/ (level design)
